trends: There have been no other sightings in Fujinomiya
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsObject was hovering in front of mount fuji I was taking pictures of the mount when I saw it it caught my eye the metallic gold material it was a really rainy cloudy day so it stand out when I saw it it was ascending then it just stop hover in the area for a while and just disappear at a really fast speed to my right
